questions.question: Which of the following is not a Fundamental Right under the Indian Constitution?
questions.explanation: Right to Property was removed from Fundamental Rights by the 44th Amendment Act, 1978.

questions.question: The Comptroller and Auditor General of India is appointed by:
questions.explanation: The CAG is appointed by the President of India.

questions.question: Which Article of the Indian Constitution deals with the Right to Constitutional Remedies?
questions.explanation: Article 32 provides the Right to Constitutional Remedies, also known as the 'heart and soul' of the Constitution.
